DOC.detailed_description: Background Purpose : Obsessive compulsive disorder affect approximately 3 % population . Treatment option include selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRIs ) , dual serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor , behavioral therapy . A recent double-blind , placebo-controlled trial demonstrate citalopram effective treatment OCD . Escitalopram new SSRI may effective SSRIs treatment major depression may fewer side effect . This study aim assess efficacy escitalopram treatment OCD . Comparisons : Subject Y-BOCs pre-post treatment . We also compare improvement subject across three different medication level : 10 mg , 20 mg , 30 mg .
